text: The women's 60 metres hurdles event at the 1984 European Athletics Indoor Championships was held on 3 March.Results (p. 500) ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Lucyna Kałek '''' |Vera Akimova '''' |Yordanka Donkova '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 3 from each heat (Q) and the next 2 fastest (q) qualified for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
